entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NAOT: Run-time `ISA.IsSupported` should be invariant #96963
  • [API Proposal]: Allow BinaryReader and BinaryWriter to read and write null strings #96959
  • runtimeconfig.json not found #96957
  • WASM UseAppHost=false but still host when I run #96955
  • docker: Error response from daemon: failed to create endpoint affectionate_thompson on network nat: Windows does not support host IP addresses in NAT settings. #96954
  • what's different between use and not use await base.OnAfterRenderAsync #96953
  • [API Proposal]: Safe API for covariant cast of ReadOnlySpan<T> #96952

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Update `System.Memory` nuget package with `Span<T>.Sort` extensions #92081
  • [browser] Unnecessary browser and node calls breaking usage in restricted environments #91558
    Future
  • [browser][MT] deadlock while disposing JS object from suspended thread #88663
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] ThreadStartException in System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests on WASM #93323
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] JavasScript promise did not completed. #94253
    9.0.0
  • Vector128 invalid code generation with tiered compilation in Release #96381
    8.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Hide CallerArgumentExpressionAttribute Parameters in Intellisense #72382
    Future
  • Plan to include Regex based Replace option in StringBuilder #62730
    Future
  • Decouple 'ILoggerFactory' and 'ILoggerProvider' from 'IDisposable' #45602
    Future
  • Add ArraySegmentPool #41240
    Future
  • Api proposal: BroadcastChannel<T> #31992
    Future
  • Modify System.Timers.Timer ctor to accept TimeSpan parameter #361
    Future
  • build mono failed "warning d9025 overriding '/EHa' with '/EHa-'" #96832
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_370233/DevDiv_370233/DevDiv_370233.cmd #96390
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • FreeBSD: Add suffix numbering for OpenSSL3 #96961
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add DOTNET_JitDisasmTier0 #96960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure that the Create(Dot(...)) optimization doesn't kick in for Vector2 pre SSE4.1 #96951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce process count for ETW manifest test #96950
    area-System.Diagnostics.TraceSource, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 120.0.6099.216, windows: 120.0.6099.217 #96949
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • JitDump and other minor improvements #96933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] ObjWriter: Clear only necessary memory in SectionWriter.EmitSymbolReference #96956
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve TeddyHelper.RightShift helpers for ARM #96928
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • [browser][debugger] fake bind_static_method #96899
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Enable the gshared-mrgctx mode by default. #96946
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • [browser] remove legacy js interop #96841
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Delete old DFS and dominator implementations #96927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] WebSocket thread affinity & server initiated close #96618
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Use auto thread dispatch in HTTP #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • breaking a string on many lines produce incorrect result if followed by a call #96948
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • JIT: Pass field's owner to getFieldType #96794
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] 32-bit platform ObjWriter and bit rot fixes #96890
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix maintenance of `genReturnBB` pointer #96935
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ContainsAny{Except} path to SearchValues #96924
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Disable load/store vector APIs until Mono adds support for it #96944
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix assertion at BigInteger.TryParse(null, out _) #96930
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove more helper frames by converting methods to QCalls #96926
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
